about_the_game:
Vanildo’s Journey: Legacy Edition is a collector's edition, basically exclusive to those who purchased the original game, that is, before it became free to play.

This deluxe edition differs from the free one because, essentially, it contains the original game files for everyone who acquired it officially between May 2022 and February 2024.

“I'm very grateful to everyone who supported the project from the beginning, who purchased the game in its earliest versions when it was still very raw and with little content. Today, years after release, we want Vanildo's message to reach more and more people, being accessible to everyone and spreading its word! ✨ 🙌”

The rewards of the Legacy package were distributed to all who participated in the early stages of the game. Its current value is purely symbolic, to validate the authenticity of this exclusive version and also, for those who want to continue supporting the game in some way.

Over time, new content will be added to the legacy package for both old and new supporters.
